ocean.fish
Class Fish

java.lang.Object
  ocean.fish.Fish

public abstract class Fish
extends java.lang.Object

An abstract fish class with provision for obtaining mouse clicks.

See Also:
OceanCanvas

Method Detail

getDirection

public abstract Direction getDirection(Coordinate from,
                                       FishMatrix matrix)
The strategy method: Returns the direction of this fish in the next step, based on the given matrix. It should not change the matrix!

Parameters:
from - The current coordinate of this fish
matrix - The FishMatrix to be examined.
Returns:
a Direction (enum-Type)

toString

public java.lang.String toString()
Returns any useful information about this fish.

Overrides:
toString in class java.lang.Object

doSomething

public java.lang.String doSomething(FishMatrix matrix)
Does something special for this fish.

Parameters:
matrix - The FishMatrix, which may also be changed in this method.
Returns:
A string describing what happened (to be displayed to the user)

draw

public void draw(java.awt.Graphics g,
                 int x,
                 int y)
Draw an image of the fish at the given position (upper left corner).

Parameters:
g - current Graphics object
x - x-coordinate in pixels
y - y-coordinate in pixels
